name: MASHTEROIDS
description:
Get in a spaceship with your friends and probably don't get blown up. Yell at each other about which way to move your ship. It's a co-op shmup. A co-shmup.

You and up to 3 friends are in a spaceship. It's got some movement buttons and some guns. Hit the guns to make the ship shoot! Crowd around the movement buttons to make the ship zippy! Don't get blown up by asteroids.

This game can be played alone but it will suck. Recommended play with 4 standard (360 or PS3) controllers. Player 1 can use the keyboard if they so choose.

Made for the 2015 Global Game Jam.

Game by Dante, some art by Britt, music by Michael McCarthy.
